fields_of_interest: Trade, Consumers, Culture, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation, Public Health, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives: Horizon 2020,  Copyright Reform,  Development and relations with UN agencies, Renewable Energy,  Citizens Initiatives, Transparency, Participation and Accountability.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit:
Commons Network is a civil society organisation that works with activists, thinkers, pioneers and policy makers to tell stories, build networks and propose policies to support commoners and defend the commons throughout Europe.  
 
CN focuses on the democractic stewardship of knowledge and the knowledge commons,  ranging from open science  to data management in the collaborative economy.
